samples.question: Why are people keen on keeping pets?
samples.transcript: Well, there are many reasons. One of them, they find it, they bring the joy, especially having a company. Some people might not, might live alone and they want some someone to accompany them, especially when they are going to for a walk or going around and they can provide a positive energy, especially when you have a tough day and there are a lot of stress on you and you come back to the home and there are, there is a nice pit within your house, whether it is a dog or a cat can relieve the stress from you when you play with them and it is a nice feeling. And another thing is, people will feel, they will feel dependable that you have to care for that animal. it is not just buying and adopting that animal. You have to wash it, you have to feed it, you have to treat the animal in a good way. They are a life being. You should be, as much as competent with them.

samples.question: What are the differences between the animals in zoos and those in the wild?
samples.transcript: Well, the animals that are living in the capture, within the cage, within a recreational area, they do not have that much space to go alone. Especially some wild animals that are, they should not be captured within a cage because their natural habitat is within the forest or within, or can be within a desert too. And it is the place they should live in. And within, there are also some drawbacks from living in the wild because many animals get sick and nobody care about them. Well, when they are within the zoo, there are some veterinary doctors that will come and check them monthly and provide a health care for them. And about the providing of the food The wild animals they should hunt They should seek for the food they need for daily While in the zoo some zoo are let say they are on a good level They can provide daily food especially for the carnivores animals Is it important to preserve wildlife? in my opinion, it is very important to, to, to preserve the natural habitat of the, wild animals, the wildlife, because it is considered to be a part of our planet, and we should keep it as natural as possible because some, some animal might have been gone and might go extinction if you do not do so. And it will damage our planet on a large scale. Because everything within the, our globe has its own parts. If something is missing, it will, imbalance the equation of the light. Great.
